Specifiche esperienze professionali cara.content: Lecturer in Econometrics, School of Business and Economics, University of Exeter
Lecturer in Economics and Econometrics, Department of Economics, University of Glasgow
Ricercatore in Economia Politica, Dipartimento di Scienze Economiche e Aziendali, Università di Padova

Professore Associato in Economia Politica, Dipartimento di Scienze Economiche e Aziendali, Università di Padova (on leave da gennaio 2017: Associate professor, Department of Economics, Monash University)

Organizzazione o partecipazione come rel.content: Partecipazione seminari/convegni: University of Rome Tor Vergata.
Partecipazione a seminari/convegni: University of Strathclyde; Bank of England; University of Glasgow.
Partecipazione a seminari/convegni: Spring Meeting of Young Economists (Geneva).

Partecipazione a seminari/convegni: University of Padova; EEA (Budapest); ESEM (Budapest); Far Eastern Meeting of the Econometrics Society (Bejing); Society for Nonlinear Dynamics and Econometrics (SNDE, St. Louis).

Partecipazione a seminari/convegni: European Economic Association (Budapest); European Meeting of the Econometric Society (Budapest); Computation in Economics and Finance conference (CEF, Montreal); Annual Meeting of the European Economics and Finance Society (Sofia).

Partecipazione a seminari/convegni: North American Summer Meeting of the Econometric Society (Pittsburgh); Enometrics XV (Collioure, France); Harvard-Hitotsubashi-Warwick Conference; CEF conference; BOMOPA 2008 (Modena).
Partecipazione a seminari/convegni: SNDE Annual Meeting (Atlanta).
Partecipazione a seminari/convegni: Money, Macro and Finance Annual Conference (Cyprus).
Partecipazione seminari/convegni: African Development Bank; University of Bologna; European Central Bank. CEF conference (San Francisco).
Partecipazione a seminari/convegni: SNDE Annual Meeting (Istanbul); CEF conference (Prague); Rimini Centre for Economic Analysis.
Organizzazione convegni: Workshop on “Sovereign Risk, Fiscal Solvency and Monetary Policy”, San Servolo Island, Venice (co-organizer with Efrem Castelnuovo, Luciano Greco and Davide Iacovoni).
Partecipazione a seminari/convegni: CEF conference (Vancouver) conference; QASS Conference (Brunel University).
Organizzazione convegni: Padova Macroeconomic Meetings (co-organizer with Efrem Castelnuovo).
Organizzazione convegni: Padova Macroeconomic Meetings (co-organizer with Efrem Castelnuovo).

Partecipazione a seminari/convegni: National Bank of Slovakia; University of Bologna; Bank of Finland; University of Helsinki; University of Melbourne; University of Adelaide; Australian School of Business (Sydney); Bundesbank. Padova Macroeconomics Meeting; SNDE Annual Meeting (New York); CEF conference (Oslo); DIW Macroeconometric Workshop (Berlin).

Partecipazione a seminari/convegni: University of Surrey; Norges Bank; Bank of England; University of Melbourne. Nordic Econometric Meeting (Helsinki); Padova Macro Talks; DIW Macroeconometric Workshop (Berlin); EME Workshop (Paris).
Organizzazione convegni: Padova Macroeconomic Meetings (co-organizer with Efrem Castelnuovo).
Organizzazione convegni: Padova Macroeconomic Meetings (co-organizer with Efrem Castelnuovo).

Partecipazione a seminari/convegni: World Bank; University of Helsinki; Bank of Finland; Ifo Institute (Munich); Banque de France; University of Verona; Workshop “Impact of Uncertainty Shocks in the Global Economy” (UCL London); Workshop “The Macroeconomics of Uncertainty and Volatility” (Melbourne Institute); CEF Conference (Bordeax); CFE Conference (Sevilla)

Responsabilita' di studi e ricerche scie.content: African Development Bank, research project: “An empirical analysis of the long-term effects of Basel III”,
The World Bank, research project: “Banking sector market structure and macroeconomic performance in the Gulf Cooperation Council (GCC) countries”.

Conseguimento di premi e riconoscimenti.content: “Marco Fanno” award for the article "Globalization, Immigration, and Lewisian Elastic Labor in Pre-War World II Southeast Asia" (joint with Gregg Huff), published by Journal of Economic History, for the best paper published by a junior faculty member of the Department of Economics, University of Padova, 2009.

Partecipazione al collegio dei docenti o.content: Membro collegio dei docenti del dottorato in Economics and Management, Dipartimento di Scienze Economiche "Marco Fanno", Università degli Studi di Padova.
Insegnamento corso "Macroeconomics", Dottorato in Economics and Management, University of Padova
